com.jack.dicewars.dice_wars

Class AbstractBoardView

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jack.dicewars.dice_wars.AbstractBoardView
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GridTextBoardView

    public abstract class AbstractBoardView
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Jack Mueller on 2/28/15. This class is the superclass for a game Board, which defines basic responsibilities like generating random versions of itself within Configuration parameters and responding to user input. It also holds a ties the .dicewars.dice_wars.TerritoryView to the actual Android View that represents it through the Activity.

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        public abstract View apply(ViewGroup viewPort)
        Puts programmatically generated views into the supplied viewPort based on the territoryViewMap and any other Views that are defined by the subclass implementation.
        Parameters:
        viewPort - The entire container allocated to viewing the board.
        Returns:
        A modified version of the viewPort that has a representation of territoryViewMap as its child nodes.
